text: Community Theatre or Community Theater may refer to: *Community theatre, the putting on of generally amateur theatre productions ;In the United States: *Community Theatre (Pine Bluff, Arkansas), listed on the National Register of Historic Places (NRHP) in Arkansas *Community Theater (Newburg, Missouri), listed on the NRHP in Missouri *Community Theatre (Kingston, New York), listed on the NRHP in Ulster County, New York Category:Lists of theatres
title: Community Theatre
